mapper.select: SELECT perm.* FROM deployment_permissions as perm JOIN deployment_group_permissions as group_perm ON perm.id = group_perm.deployment_permission_id JOIN deployment_user_groups as user_group ON group_perm.deployment_group_id = user_group.deployment_group_id JOIN users as usr ON user_group.user_email = usr.user_email WHERE usr.user_email = #{userEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deployment_permissions (name, service_id, environment_id, permission_type) VALUES (#{name}, #{serviceId}, #{environmentId}, #{permissionType})
